name: Match Fighter VR
description:
Chat with us :D 👉 Discord

The best casual Match-Three game during your spare time, start your camping trip in the forest!

The Match Fighter forest lies a rich variety of treasures, and when you step out of your tent, you'll find that even at home you can experience the full atmosphere and joy of camping. If you look carefully at the treasure lot hiding in the bush, you will soon find two identical one! While playing, you can explore the forest and get in touch with nature, or you can return to the tent for a short nap, and grab the decorations in the room and you may have a surprise discovery.

Key Features:

🌳 Immersive camping themed forest scenes, you can explore the surroundings while playing

🎪 A warm and exquisite tent just for you, touch the items inside and you may find something unexpected

✨ A variety of matching models: cute animals, sweet food, cool toys & beautiful accessories

⭐ You will win a surprise reward if you pass the level within the time limit

👪 Upcoming Friends Party will allow you to enjoy the game with friends or like-minded strangers

We will continue to iterate and update our game, including friends party, online mode, rich scenes and props, and more immersive interactive experience, so stay tuned! We'd love to hear from you to help us provide you with more interesting gameplay and a more comfortable gaming experience.
